Posts.Content: I know preganancy would change the color of the whole areola, but this is just a faint ring outline. I have a whole year to go before my insurance pays for another visit, thats a long time to wonder!
Posts.Title: color change concerning areola

Posts.Content:
My grandmother had radical double mastectomies. As far as I know, my mother is fine. I am 30 and getting a mammogram next year. Just noticed this year my areola has a super faint ring about
 the size of a quarter. I only noticed the faint outline because part of the line includes the skin above the areola. Does anyone know what this could be?
Posts.Title: color change concerning areola
